text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea platycarpa (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Light Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Singapore. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea platycarpa". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33135A9761348. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33135A9761348.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
